mapper.select: SELECT `user`.account, `user`.nickName, `user`.birthday, `user`.headImageUrl, `user`.createTime, family_group.`name` as groupName, family_group.creator, family_group.id as groupId FROM `user` LEFT JOIN family_user on `user`.account = family_user.userId LEFT JOIN family_group on family_user.familyId = family_group.id WHERE `user`.account = #{account} and `user`.password = #{password};
mapper.update:
update `user` SET
nickName = #{nickName},
birthday = #{birthday},
headImageUrl = #{headImageUrl},
WHERE account = #{account};
mapper.select: SELECT us.nickName, us.birthday FROM `user` us LEFT JOIN family_user fu on fu.userId =us.account WHERE ((MONTH(us.birthday) - MONTH(NOW()) = 0 AND DAY(us.birthday)-DAY(NOW())>=0) OR (MONTH(us.birthday) - MONTH(NOW()) = 1 AND DAY(NOW()) - DAY(us.birthday) >=0) ) AND fu.familyId = #{groupId}
